column1: Based on the document you provided
column2: here's the extraction of all event-related data organized into a CSV format:
The Lab presents the Lila2 Interface
column3: The Lab will present the Lila2 Interface, a visualization tool that enables users to perform ad-hoc analyses.
The Emotions of London, another geographical project, will update the group on their recent work.
Matt Wilkens, Assistant Professor of English at Notre Dame University, will discuss the geography of American literature.

column2: Discussion on The Canon and Archive Project
column3: The Canon and Archive project will discuss their hypotheses and first results.
The members of the Lab's Suspense project will present a background of the project's aims along with some initial findings.

column1: This CSV format organizes the events by date
column2: and includes columns for the event title
column5: and the location of each event as reported in the document.
